extension.name: CiviCRM FullCalendar
extension.author: Louis Giacalone, Andrew Schmitt
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: A Joomla module for CiviCRM that displays CiviEvent events in an interactive calendar, using FullCalendar. See https://github.com/lgiacalone3/fullcal for full documentation. Authored by Louis Giacalone and Andrew Schmitt.

field.name: default_view
field.label: Default View/Layout
field.description: The default view the user will see. For more info, see the FullCalendar documentation at http://arshaw.com/fullcalendar/docs/views/Available_Views/

field.name: weekMode
field.label: Week view (in monthl view)
field.description: In the month layout, this determines how many weeks are shown. For more info, see the FullCalendar documentation at http://arshaw.com/fullcalendar/docs/display/weekMode/

field.name: aspectRatio
field.label: Width-to-height aspect ratio.
field.description: A calendar is a block-level element that fills its entire avaiable width. The calendarâ€™s height, however, is determined by this ratio of width-to-height. (Hint: larger numbers make smaller heights). For example, a value of 2 will initialize a calendar who's width is twice its height. For more info, see the FullCalendar documentation at http://arshaw.com/fullcalendar/docs/display/aspectRatio/

field.name: axisFormat
field.label: Agenda view vertical axis time format
field.description: Determines the time-text that will be displayed on the vertical axis of the agenda views. The value is a format-string that will be processed by formatDate. The default value of 'h:mm TT' will produce times that look like '9:00 AM' and '1:00 PM'. For those outside of the United States, you may prefer 'H:mm'. For more info, see the FullCalendar documentation at http://arshaw.com/fullcalendar/docs/agenda/axisFormat/

field.name: showCalNav
field.label: Calendar Navigation Buttons
field.description: Show or Hide calendar navigation buttons

field.name: firstHour
field.label: First hour of the day (in agenda views)
field.description: In the month layout, this determines how many weeks are shown. For more info, see the FullCalendar documentation at http://arshaw.com/fullcalendar/docs/agenda/firstHour/

field.name: slotMinutes
field.label: Time slot duration minutes.
field.description: Integer value for time slot duration in minutes in the agneda views. For more info, see the FullCalendar documentation at http://arshaw.com/fullcalendar/docs/agenda/slotMinutes/

field.name: maxevents
field.label: Maximum Events Listed
field.description: Maximum number of events to be listed.

field.name: showduration
field.label: Show event duration?
field.description: Indicate if you want the event duration shown.

field.name: summary
field.label: Display Summary Text?
field.description: Do you want to include event summary text with the listing?

field.name: modal
field.label: Link Style
field.description: Select Modal Link or Normal Link

field.name: pastevents
field.label: Display Past Events
field.description: Show or hide events that have already happened

field.name: colorpicker
field.label: Color Theme
field.description: Choose a color theme for events

field.name: legendpicker
field.label: Choice of Legend
field.description: Choose a color theme for events

field.label: Custom Colors (for this, choose 'Custom Colors' in the Color Theme dropdown box above. In the text box to the below, use CSS color names or hex values separated by spaces.)

field.name: tid
field.label: Event Type
field.query: SELECT civicrm_option_value.value, civicrm_option_value.label FROM civicrm_option_value INNER JOIN civicrm_option_group ON (civicrm_option_value.option_group_id = civicrm_option_group.id) WHERE (civicrm_option_group.name = 'event_type') AND (civicrm_option_value.is_active = '1')
